extendedInfo.description: Ever wanted to hear a cat meow "Black Sheep"? Now you can! Guaranteed the best how to draw animals game out there!Colorful graphics, animal sound effects, helpful voice narrating, and lots of fun! Have your kids learn counting, shapes, colors, and the animals sound while being entertained!   Want to learn how to draw animals with pleasant background sound ?The best coloring, drawing and learning app for kids (parents will love it too!)You are going to learn how to draw:> Bear> Bull> Camel> Deer> Dog> Donkey> Elephant> Buffalo> Monkey> Tiger> Lion> Rhino> Pig> Cat                                      in a step by step manner and you can practice it immediately inside the app.In addition if you like yourdrawing you can save it to your device. Learn how to Draw Animals. Become an Artist by learning how to draw. These easy to follow step by step lessons will have you animating and drawing for fun in no time! Learn Step by Step on how to draw animals for free with How to Draw Animals app.This is a step by step instruction which will teach you how to draw animated animals characters. Try yourself, teach your kid orimpress your friends with your drawing skills.Each character on how to draw is designed to learn drawing step by step. How to draw a animals makes you an artist much easier than any training class you can attend. Encompass best practices for learning how to draw by providing simple shapes and showing how simpleshape can be used to draw animals and things.Leaning drawing is passion for kids and adults alike.Happy Drawing!We love creating apps, and want to keep them free forever. In order to keep our development running we areusing a search service to generate some revenue from this free app. This app will add a couple search links on your device in the form of an icon, bookmark link and browser homepage. You may delete them easily (drag to the trash or delete the link for the browser), if you choose to use them, thanks!keys: how to draw animals, how to paint, learn to draw,anime, animals, child, picture, image, color, animals for kids, drawing app
